result.eng: It is a new source of energy.
result.html: foinse nua fuinnimh éIt is a new source of energy.
result.ponchtml: foinse nua fuinniṁ éIt is a new source of energy.

result.eng: There is no energy in me anymore.
result.ga: níl aon fhuinneamh ionam níos mó
result.orig: níl aon fhuinneamh ionam níos mó
result.html: níl aon fhuinneamh ionam níos móThere is no energy in me anymore.
result.ponchtml: níl aon ḟuinneaṁ ionam níos móThere is no energy in me anymore.

result.eng: The meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ga: shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.orig: shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asam
result.html: shúigh an cruinniú an fuinneamh ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.
result.ponchtml: ẛúiġ an cruinniú an fuinneaṁ ar fad asamThe meeting sucked all my energy out of me.

result.eng: There is strength and energy in me.
result.ga: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionam
result.orig: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionam
result.html: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
result.ponchtml: tá neart agus fuinneaṁ ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
